      • Camera

        public Camera(float x,
      float y,
      float width,
      float height)
        Creates a new camera
        Parameters:
        x - the x value initialized at, both lookAt and cameraPosition
        y - the y value initialized at, both lookAt and cameraPosition
        width, - the viewport width
        height, - the viewport height
